DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine treat patient coronary heart disease hyperbaric oxygen ( HBO ) prior coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) surgery reduce injury heart vascular system surgery . Furthermore , study also aim identify post CABG clinical effect HBO treatment prior CABG .
DOC.brief_title: The Protective Effects Of Treatment With Hyperbaric Oxygen Prior To Bypass Heart Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo elective first time CABG Patients least 1 vessel coronary artery disease undergo pump CABG Age ≤ 20 year ≥ 85 year Ejection fraction < 30 % Unstable angina Recent myocardial infarction ( < 1 month ) Any additional cardiac disease ( e.g . arrythmia , aneurysm , valvular/septal disease , dissection elevate pulmonary artery pressure ) Any end stage organ failure ( e.g . renal respiratory failure ) History chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) Pneumothorax Pulmonary bullae Convulsions Current history malignancy Severe myopia intraocular lens Patients K+ ( ATP ) Channel Openers e.g . Nicorandil , Oral Hypoglycemics , Opioid Analgesics , Catecholamines .
